name: landlordos
description: Modern SaaS application for landlords and property managers

scripts.dev: echo "Please install dependencies first: npm run install:all"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint

author: Your Name
